# "Auroral Awakenings"
## Scripture
"The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands." - Psalm 19:1

## Reflection
As we gaze upon the breathtaking display of the Northern Lights, we are reminded of God's awe-inspiring glory. The dancing colors and swirling patterns of the aurora borealis evoke a sense of wonder and reverence. Just as the Northern Lights illuminate the night sky, God's presence illuminates our lives, dispelling darkness and filling us with hope. In the stillness of the winter night, we can hear the whispers of God's promise to be with us, to guide us, and to strengthen us.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, as we marvel at the beauty of the Northern Lights, we are reminded of your majestic glory. Help us to behold your handiwork in the skies and to recognize your presence in our lives. May the auroral awakenings of your glory stir our hearts to worship and our souls to rejoice. As we navigate the seasons of life, may we remain fixed on your steadfast love and faithfulness, shining brightly like the stars in the night sky. Illuminate our path, dear Lord, and fill us with the light of your love. Amen.
